summary: Feature 6 testing complete: Outstanding balance check when registering new payment. Backend: 7/7 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI elements verified and working correctly.
passed_tests: Feature 6: GET /api/tenants/{tenant_id}/outstanding endpoint exists and returns proper structure
Feature 6: Outstanding returns empty when tenant has no apartment assigned
Feature 6: Outstanding returns unpaid months when tenant has apartment but no payments
Feature 6: Outstanding excludes months that have been paid
Feature 6: Outstanding returns 404 for non-existent tenant
Feature 6: Outstanding returns suggestion message when there are unpaid months
Feature 6: Outstanding months are sorted with oldest first
Feature 6: Orange warning box appears in payment modal when tenant has outstanding balance
Feature 6: Warning shows number of outstanding months
Feature 6: Warning shows total outstanding amount in SRD
Feature 6: Warning shows oldest unpaid month
Feature 6: Period month/year selector auto-selects oldest unpaid month
Feature 6: Month selector shows ⚠️ emoji next to unpaid months
Feature 6: Year selector shows ⚠️ emoji next to years with unpaid months
Feature 6: Label shows '(oudste geselecteerd)' indicating oldest month is selected
seed_data_creation: Test data created with prefix 'TEST_Feature6_' during testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Feature 6 (Outstanding balance check) has been fully tested and verified. The GET /api/tenants/{tenant_id}/outstanding endpoint correctly returns outstanding months for a tenant. The frontend payment modal shows an orange warning box when a tenant has unpaid months, displays the total outstanding amount, and auto-selects the oldest unpaid month in the period selector. Month/year dropdowns show ⚠️ emoji next to unpaid periods.

feature_6_outstanding_balance.backend_endpoint: ✓ GET /api/tenants/{tenant_id}/outstanding returns outstanding months, amount, and suggestion message
feature_6_outstanding_balance.frontend_warning: ✓ Orange warning box appears in payment modal with 'Openstaand saldo' title
feature_6_outstanding_balance.outstanding_info: ✓ Shows number of outstanding months, total amount (SRD), and oldest unpaid month
feature_6_outstanding_balance.auto_select: ✓ Period month/year auto-selects oldest unpaid month
feature_6_outstanding_balance.warning_emoji: ✓ Month and year dropdowns show ⚠️ emoji next to unpaid periods
feature_6_outstanding_balance.label_indicator: ✓ Label shows '(oudste geselecteerd)' when outstanding months exist
